properties.title: Emmental Show Dairy
properties.abstract: The Emmental Show Dairy lets you see the modern production methods for the world-famous Emmental AOC as well as traditional techniques. You'll learn many interesting and surprising facts about the production and storage of cheese throughout history.
properties.description:
The little cheese village is an experience of its own. You can discover for yourself the four generations of the dairy. Several times a day, you'll have the opportunity to see how Emmental AOC is made.

Watch the production process live from the visitor's gallery and learn more through the audiovisual system, which is available in five languages. At three different locations, you'll learn about the production and storage of Emmental AOC. A short film also provides information about the dairy industry and farming, as well as about culture and traditions.

Groups can make their own cheese under the guidance of a professional cheese maker. Tours, cheese-rolling obstacle courses and farm tours are available with advanced booking.
